Title: Browse Products
Description: I want to browse through categories of products so that I can find items I might be interested in.

Title: Search Functionality
Description: I want to use a search bar to find specific products by typing keywords so that I can quickly find what I'm looking for.

Title: View Product Details
Description: I want to click on products to view detailed information such as price descriptions specifications and customer reviews so that I can make informed decisions.

Title: Create an Account
Description: I want to create an account using my email or social media profiles so that I can save my preferences and order history.

Title: Password Recovery
Description: I want to recover my forgotten password through my email so that I can regain access to my account.

Title: Add to Cart
Description: I want to add products to my shopping cart so that I can purchase multiple items in a single transaction.

Title: Checkout Process
Description: I want to easily proceed to checkout enter my shipping and payment information and confirm my order so that I can complete my purchase.

Title: Order Tracking
Description: I want to track my order status after I have made a purchase so that I know when to expect delivery.

Title: Leave Reviews
Description: I want to leave reviews for products I have purchased so that I can share my experience with other shoppers.

Title: Receive Recommendations
Description: I want to receive personalized product recommendations based on my browsing and purchase history so that I can discover items that match my interests.
